headline.main: WORLD PARLIAMENT IS PREDICTED BY FORD; He Asks Election by All Peoples to Bring a Peace Basis

lead_paragraph: DETROIT, Jan. 1 (U.P.) -- Henry Ford predicted in a New Year's Day statement today the ultimate creation of a world parliament "to put the world on a peace basis."
abstract: H Ford predicts world parliament as world peace basis
snippet: DETROIT, Jan. 1 (U.P.) -- Henry Ford predicted in a New Year's Day statement today the ultimate creation of a world parliament "to put the world on a peace basis."...
